subject: Question about pedals
description_text:
Hello I’m looking at getting the 
Simsonn Plus x p2 h2 with base plate and if I got the vam rumble motor 3  would all this fit together and plug in and work or would I need anything else to have this all set up working  thanks Charles 

Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Charles Constantinou,    Yes, no need to purchase anything extra. If you buy the haptics separately, you'll need to purchase a controller separately. However, if you buy the pedals at the same time, the controller is included, so there's no need to worry.

Yeah I was going to buy the pedals and the base plate and the haptics all at once on your website so that will be all fine won’t it all ready to plug and play 
Sent from my iPhone

>

I’ve made an order there #SSN3774 but I’ve not got a email about my order  was wondering is this normal ?
Sent from my iPhone

>

Hi Charles Constantinou,  We have received your order, which includes the black PlusX P2-H2 pedals and three VAM motors with a 24V standalone power supply. Please rest assured that we will ship your order as usual. Also, did you provide an email address when placing the order?

I think so I did the order on my phone ao not 100% sure but this is my email address for the order thanks 
Sent from my iPhone

>
